data.title: Talbot Mundy
data.meta_description: West Kingston, RI: Donald M. Grant Pub Inc, 1983. First edition. Very Good+/Very Good+. First Edition, with "First Published 1983" on copyright page. Clean blue
data.text: West Kingston, RI: Donald M. Grant Pub Inc, 1983. First edition. Very Good+/Very Good+. First Edition, with "First Published 1983" on copyright page. Clean blue-black cloth boards with bright gold lettering on spine. No bumping or fraying. Binding is tight & square, pages and edges are clean. Clean endpapers; no names, writing or marks. 253 pgs. Illustrated with black & white photographs. Clean original dustjacket designed by Ned Dameron is not price clipped, no tears, has one tiny v-shaped chip at top right corner near flap fold. Enclosed in new archival quality removable mylar cover. A biography of the prolific and mysterious author, Talbot Mundy, author of such books as "King of the Khyber Rifles", Tros of Samothrace", "Purple Pirate." Provides newly revealed information about the author, white providing bibliographical material for the collector-enthusiast.
